description: Square array T(n, k), n, k > 0, read by antidiagonals; let b be the function that associates to any pair of integers (u, v) the BÃ©zout coefficients (x, y) as produced by the extended Euclidean algorithm (u*x + v*y = gcd(u, v)); T(n, k) is the number of iterations of b when starting from (n, k) needed to obtain a unit vector.
